edu.bellarmine.rrk.Joust

Class ListField

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.bellarmine.rrk.Joust.ListField

  • public class ListField
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models a ListField object on which knights joust.
    Version:
    1.1 Lab11 - Knight Project Fall 2018
    Author:
    Rob Kelley

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ListField()
      Empty-Argument constructor that creates/initializes two Knight objects.
      ListField(Knight k1, Knight k2)
      This constructor builds a list field with two knights at creation time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addKnights(Knight k1, Knight k2)
      Method that adds two knights to the list field after the listfield object has been created.
      java.lang.String joust()
      This method performs the actual joust.

        Parameters:
        k1 -
        k2 -

      • joust

        public java.lang.String joust()
        This method performs the actual joust. Each knight bets experience points, the points are compared, the knight who used the most experience points wins.
        Returns:
        winner - output of the match
